title: Hitman 3 Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.19.21
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk #Hitman3 reviews, a new #Cyberpunk lawsuit, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:08:18 - Housekeeping
Our Hitman 3 review is live on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and a brand new Kinda Funny Podcast is live on youtube.com/kindafunny!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack!
The Roper Report   -
00:10:30 - Hitman Review Round-up
00:14:40 - As someone who never played one these is it worth to start with 3 or are the changes to the mechanics so minimal that maybe I should start with the cheaper option that Hitman 2 is and see if it grabs me from there. - Best Friends Q: Diego
00:38:00 -  Ad
00:28:50 - Another Cyberpunk Lawsuit Filed, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:41:40 - Ubisoft Returns to an In-Person Event, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:48:02 - More PUBG Coming, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:49:20 - Out today
00:56:30 - Squad Up:Jim Knapp(PS4) - Knapptain
00:57:20 - You‘re Wrong
